spell.name: Apples to oranges
entries: Make a spell attack roll on an object up to 5 cubic feet in size. You have disadvantage on the attack if the item is attended. On a hit, the object is transformed into a similar sized natural object of your choice. Creatures of tiny size and smaller may be targeted, and get a Charisma Saving Throw to avoid all effects. Creatures transformed by this spell retain all stats and abilities, but suffer disadvantage to all Charisma checks and saving throws unless cured by Greater Restoration or similar. Magical items are immune to this spell.

spell.name: Decaying Touch
entries: You touch a creature with vile negative energies that cause healing magic to rot them instead. Make a melee spell attack against a creature you can reach. On a hit, the creature takes {@damage 4d8} necrotic damage, and is afflicted with decay. Instead of restoring hitpoints, the creature takes necrotic damage equal to the amount normally healed while afflicted. The target can make a Constitution saving throw at the end of each of its turns to end the affliction. The affliction also ends if the duration of the spell ends, or the target has a spell like remove curse or stronger used on them.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: For every level above 2nd, the creature takes an additional {@damage 1d8} necrotic damage on a hit.

spell.name: Decaying Aura
entries: You taint the very air around you with negative energy, causing creatures around you to rot from healing magic. During the duration of this spell, hostile creatures within 15 feet of you must make a Constitution saving throw when they are healed by magical means. On a failure, instead of healing, they take {@damage 6d12} necrotic damage. On a success, they are healed by half the normal amount.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: For every level above 4th, a creature takes an additional {@damage 1d12} necrotic damage on a failed saving throw.

spell.name: Animate Beast

components.m: A drop of blood, a piece of flesh and a pinch of bone dust

entries: This spell creates an Undead servant. Choose a pile of bones or a corpse of a Medium or smaller beast within range. Your spell imbues the target with a foul mimicry of life, raising it as an Undead creature. The target becomes a {@creature Skeletal Wolf|AAA|Skeletal Beast} if you chose bones or a {@creature Zombie Wolf|AAA|Zombie Beast} if you chose a corpse.

On each of your turns, you can use a Bonus Action to mentally Command any creature you made with this spell if the creature is within 60 feet of you (if you control multiple creatures, you can Command any or all of them at the same time, issuing the same Command to each one). You decide what action the creature will take and where it will move during its next turn, or you can issue a general Command, such as to guard a particular chamber or corridor. If you issue no commands, the creature only defends itself against hostile creatures. Once given an order, the creature continues to follow it until its task is complete.

The creature is under your control for 24 hours, after which it stops obeying any Command you've given it. To maintain the control of the creature for another 24 hours, you must cast this spell on the creature again before the current 24-hour period ends. This use of the spell reasserts your control over up to four creatures you have animated with this spell, rather than animating a new one.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, you animate or reassert control over two additional Undead creatures for each slot above 3rd. Each of the creatures must come from a different corpse or pile of bones.

spell.name: Phoenix Dive

components.m: A dart fletched with phoenix feathers

entries: Briefly surrounded by elemental flame, you teleport up to 90 feet to an unoccupied space that you can see. Creatures and objects within 10 feet of the space you teleport to must make a Dexterity saving throw, or take {@damage 3d10} fire damage. Unattended inflammable objects within the area alight.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: The damage increases by {@dice 1d10} for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Shocking Bursts
entries: Electric shocks burst from each of your hands. Make a ranged spell attack for each burst. You can aim the bursts at one target or two. You have advantage on the attack roll if the target is made of metal, or wearing metal armor. On a hit the target takes {@damage 3d6} Lightning damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: For every level above 2nd, the targets take {@dice 1d6} more lightning damage on a hit.

spell.name: Permafrost
entries: Ice coats one creature you can see within range. The target must make a Constitution saving throw. It takes {@damage 8d6} Cold damage on a failed save, or half as much on a success. In addition, on a failure the creature is frozen for the duration. The frozen target has its speed reduced by 30. At the end of each of its turns the target repeats the saving throw. It takes {@damage 2d6} Cold damage on a failed save, and the spell ends on a successful one. If this damage kills a target, it becomes a frozen statue until thawed.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: For every level above third, the creature takes an additional {@damage 1d6} damage on each failed save.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
entries: The skeleton has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The skeleton has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of its allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit 7 ({@damage 2d4 + 2}) piercing damage. If the target is a creature it must succeed on a {@dc 11} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition Prone}.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
entries: The skeleton has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The skeleton has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of its allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Undead Fortitude
entries: If damage reduces the zombie to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the Zombie drops to 1 hit point instead.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit 5 ({@damage 2d4 + 1}) piercing damage.
